com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference

Class Donation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.e.zhongjieruan.donationmakedifference.Donation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DonationAdmin, DonationSpecialUser

    public abstract class Donation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains information for a single donation and donation related method

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Donation(int currentReceived) 
      Donation(java.lang.String donationName, int donationAmount, java.lang.String donationDetail)
      Constructor that initiate the donation name, donation amount, and donation detail.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract int deletePost(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String name)
      This is a abstract method, child classes can implement it differently SpecialUser is a user who have been proved by admin and be able to post donation Special user can delete their own post Admin can delete any post if admin this the post is inappropriate
      abstract long editPost(android.content.Context context, DonationSpecialUser donationSpecialUser)
      This is a abstract method, child classes can implement it differently SpecialUser is a user who have been proved by admin and be able to post donation Special User can edit the post they posted Admin canedit any posts

        donationName - Title of the donation
        donationAmount - How much money needed for this donation
        donationDetail - Detailed information about this donation

      • editPost

        public abstract long editPost(android.content.Context context,
                              DonationSpecialUser donationSpecialUser)
        This is a abstract method, child classes can implement it differently SpecialUser is a user who have been proved by admin and be able to post donation Special User can edit the post they posted Admin canedit any posts
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the Andriod activity used to call database
        donationSpecialUser - The user who posted current donation
        Returns:
        return Return type of long, >0 indicate submit or review successful

      • deletePost

        public abstract int deletePost(android.content.Context context,
                               java.lang.String name)
        This is a abstract method, child classes can implement it differently SpecialUser is a user who have been proved by admin and be able to post donation Special user can delete their own post Admin can delete any post if admin this the post is inappropriate
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the Andriod activity used to call database
        name - Title of the donation that need to be deleted
        Returns:
        return Return type of int, >0 indicate submit or review successful
